name: bewilderedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you are very confused or do not understand what is happening: "What are you doing here?" she asked bewilderedly. He didn't answer, but looked at me bewilderedly. Bewilderedly she struggled to remember what he had told her. Related word
bewildered
More examplesFewer examplesThey stared bewilderedly at the scene that greeted them. "What's going on?" the man asked bewilderedly. She wondered bewilderedly how the jacket could be missing from the car when the doors were still locked and she had the only key.
